description:
The classic solitaire game. This is a 31 peg cross board. It has eight built in layouts plus the ability to do custom layouts. 

The program features hand-drawn graphics from Sinacism Graphics who did the graphics for Reversi.  

You clear the marbles off the board by jumping one marble over another
into an empty space. The marble you jump over is removed from the
board automatically.  Only one marble can move at a time, and only in an up, down, left or right direction. Never diagonally. The game is won when only one marble remains. This version is an update for Pixi
